name: Grupo Sabra
tagline: We’re passionate about making things well
description:
Founded in 2009, Grupo Sabra is a full-service mobile application and software development firm with offices in Argentina (Buenos Aires, Tucumán), USA (Fort Lauderdale) and Spain (Madrid). We serve clients in  (USA, Caribe, Latam and Europe). We have delivered projects to our rapidly growing client list spanning the industry from entrepreneurial startups to mayor companies.
We offer tailored solutions to meet software needs of today — and tomorrow — including custom mobile and web software, user-first UX/UI design, backend integration, data analytics/BI efficiency and consulting. 
We take pride in creating software that makes a difference. We’re passionate about making things well, and that’s what makes us different from other companies. The delivery model is agile and sprint based. We use frameworks, wherever needed to speed up the app development process.
Service Offerings
Mobile Strategy & Business Process Redesign
Mobile Experience Design 
Native App Development
Mobile & Responsive App Development
Cloud/API Integration & Deployment
Cross-Platform App Development
Are you ready to innovate?
